thread.title: Shazam: 5 Actors Who Could Hold Their Own Opposite The Rock
thread.title_full: Shazam: 5 Actors Who Could Hold Their Own Opposite The Rock

author: Charlie Ridgely
title: Shazam: 5 Actors Who Could Hold Their Own Opposite The Rock
text:
Shazam: 5 Actors Who Could Hold Their Own Opposite The Rock Charlie Ridgely Start Slideshow Slide of 
The Shazam and Black Adam movies are coming to theaters in the next few years, and fans can hardly wait to witness the epic super-showdown that will occur within the films. 
Boy-turned-god Shazam, versus the deadly ancient warrior Black Adam - it's bound to be mesmerizing. 
Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson has long been cast as the villain, so Warner Bros. now just has to work on finding his rival. 
This casting decision is difficut, because a delicate balance is needed for Shazam. The actor chosen needs to be able to capture the boyish attitude of Shazam's inner-monologue, but he also needs to be believable as The Rock's foe. 
There are only a few actors who could pull this off, and we've got a couple of suggestions. Click through the slides to see five actors who could hold their own against The Rock's Black Adam.
